artist: After Jacopo da Ponte (Jacopo Bassano); Hamlet Winstanley
description: Jacob standing in front of a pair of oxen at right, looking left; following God's command to take his family into Egypt; two boys feeding goats, sheep and leading a donkey; a mounted figure in distance

Signature, Date, and Inscription

title: Jacob in Egypt
